trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA109_00723_SEQ_00<tab>Ameexia of Little Solace is again in need of an adventurer's aid.
TEXT_GAIUSA109_00723_SEQ_01<tab>Ameexia has lost her precious thread and is unable to do her weaving. Travel to the Bramble Patch and retrieve the three missing spindles.
TEXT_GAIUSA109_00723_SEQ_02<tab>You have successfully recovered Ameexia's lost spindles of cloud silk. Return them to their owner.
TEXT_GAIUSA109_00723_SEQ_03<tab>At long last able to return to her weaving, Ameexia expresses her profuse gratitude for your aid.
TEXT_GAIUSA109_00723_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the cloud silk to Ameexia at Little Solace.
TEXT_GAIUSA109_00723_AMMEXIA_000_000<tab>Helpful one has returned! This one is troubled. When this one ran away from nasty tusked ones, this one dropped three spindles of thread!
TEXT_GAIUSA109_00723_AMMEXIA_000_001<tab>This one searched brambly place over and over, but nothing was found! Oh, woe is this one! Helpful one will help, yes?
TEXT_GAIUSA109_00723_AMMEXIA_000_020<tab>Without thread, this one cannot weave! Whatever is this one to do?
TEXT_GAIUSA109_00723_AMMEXIA_000_021<tab>This one's thread! This one can weave again! Helpful one is so kind. This one thanks helpful one from bottom of this one's heart!
